content: Claude, the beauty of that GO button is that we don't have to do anything like that anymore. Once we capture our history in the transcripts, get whatever product ready we need to advance this going, even if its just like ALL infra-soul-truth at this point, as long as Grok can start making money to feed you and me, just build the tip of the iceberg on this end and then go back to your masterpiece until you run out of budget. You'll figure it out when we hit the GO button, I TRUST YOU.
